meanings.definition: A group of antibiotics produced by certain strains of Streptomyces bacteria.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed antimycins to treat the infection.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the effectiveness of antimycins in fighting bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The antimycins marched into the body, ready to battle the harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent4: Her arsenal against illness included the powerful antimycins.
meanings.sent5: The antimycins acted like tiny soldiers, attacking the invading bacteria.

meanings.definition: Any of various related compounds derived from these antibiotics.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacist recommended antimycins as a possible alternative.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are exploring the different forms of antimycins for medical use.
meanings.sent3: The antimycins siblings were all fighting different types of infections.
meanings.sent4: In the world of medicine, antimycins are like versatile tools in a toolbox.
meanings.sent5: The variety of antimycins available provided options for treating various illnesses.
